name: Smash Randomizer
description:
This is a fan-made tool to help you randomize your Smash Bros Ultimate play session! 

This app was made because I like to play random characters and I also like playing as the Mii's who never show up in normal random. Additionally this app let's me make it so that I never have to play that one character again.

Features:

Random vs Playlist setting. Smash Bros Ultimate default to Playlist mode, which means that if you're playing Random then it won't pick a character again until you've played all other characters first. True Random means you can get the same character 5 times in a row, because random. Additionally I believe that random in Smash currently favors characters you play the least, whereas this app should be truly select randomly.

Squad Strike Random: Create a playlist for 3 player and 5 player Squad Strike.
